name: OSD
Pre-Commencement
WorkSafe notification before trenching below 1.5m deep has been submitted
If required, trench shields are on site & ready for use
Dig Permit completed by contractor & attached
Exclusion Zones have been erected as required (Attach photos below)
Existing in-ground services located and verified before excavation
Detail excavation
Excavation depths & locations confirmed prior to detailed excavation commencing
Any services (overhead / below ground) considered & isolated where required before excavation commences
Approval given to contractor to commence detail excavation
Excavation measurements align with drawings
Depth, Width & Length correct
Excavation works - completed to specification/drawings & Area left clean/tidy
FINAL - Pass when happy to proceed with work(s) (Any issues please comment below)
Tanks/ Pumps / Chambers/ Grease arrestor Installation
Bedding material- correct type, grade and depth installed to support service
Product delivered is in good condition and correct as per specifications
Tanks/Pumps/Chambers/Grease arrestor Installed in the correct location and required depth
Items are correctly sealed
Conduits installed - Provide photos
Cables pulled through conduit
Installation 100% Completed - All final checks, documentation completed & attached - (Attach photos below)
FINAL - Pass when work(s) are completed (Any issues please comment below)
Backfill
Tanks/ Pumps / Chambers/ Grease arrestor covered and made safe
Trench suitably backfilled and compacted
Expansion lagging installed around pipes before concrete - If applicable
Rissers lagging has been installed - If applicable
HOLD POINT - Subcontractor QA Reviewed (Comment issues below)
Test completed by contractor and confirmed to Ryman
Once reviewed & approved - Please attach (if applicable)
Works 100% completed to specification/drawings & Area left clean/tidy
FINAL - Pass when happy to proceed with work(s) (Any issues please comment below)
